createSnapshot

public java.io.Serializable createSnapshot()
Creates a snapshot of the state of RegionalAreaHandler data control. This method is called when a save point is created.

Returns:

restoreSnapshot

public void restoreSnapshot(java.io.Serializable p1)
Restore the state of RegionalAreaHandler DataControl with the snapshot state that is referenced by the handle. This method is called when a save point is restored.

Parameters:
p1 - Serializable snapshot handle that was created with createSnapShot()
